item.title: Drone Explosion in Haiti Kills 2 SWAT Members, Injures 6 Others
item.description: A drone intended for attacking gang members detonated at a police base, raising questions about how the deadly operations are conducted.

item.title: Russia Demands Role in Guaranteeing Ukraine’s Postwar Security
item.description: European and Ukrainian officials call the idea ludicrous, showing the large gaps in peace negotiations.

item.title: Xi Jinping Visits Tibet as Dalai Lama’s Succession Looms
item.description: A power struggle is taking shape over choosing a successor to the 90-year-old Buddhist leader. In a trip to Tibet’s capital, China’s leader emphasized...

item.title: Hong Kong Government Fixates on ‘Soft Resistance’
item.description: With pro-democracy movements long squashed, the government is targeting any hint of subtler expressions of discontent. Even establishment figures say ...

item.title: What Russia Is Doing to Grab Ukrainian Land While It Still Can
item.description: As negotiations over the war carry on, President Vladimir V. Putin is pushing hard with tactics that have evolved over three and a half years.
